Mukati mwa ulendo wake, anakumana na musikana anavala magamba ndipo musikana anapempa vovala va Nonkungu. Pamene musikana anali kusinta vovala, Nonkungu anaona kuti musikana anali na mucila ndipo anaziwa kuti uyu musikana ni Mbulu!

title: Nokungu N'Eimbulu
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!
author: Dennis Ogaro Ondieki

title: NokÅ©ngÅ© Na YalyÅ©ka
description: Nonkungu is sent to her rich uncle who lives in another village by her parents. She's very excited and she's got on a beautiful beaded dress made by her mother. On her way to her uncle's village, she meets a young girl across the stream who also claims to be uncle Mtonyama's niece and is also coincidentally visiting him. She complements Nonkungu on her beautiful beaded dress and asks if she can try it on. Nonkungu agrees and when they exchange clothes she then realises that the girl is really an imbulu. She is frightened. Do you think Nonkungu's journey will be smooth? What will happen to the imbulu? Read on to find out what happens in this exciting tale!

description: Ts'epang  olula le batsoli ba hae empa o romeloa ke batsoali ba hae ho ea lula le Rangoane oa hae Teboho oa morui. Tseleng o qhekanyetysoa ke Katse ea lehata e ikentseng ngoanana. E mo kopa hore ba kalimisane ka mese le sefaha nako e khuts'oane ha ba ntse ba tsamaisana tsela ho ea ha Rangoane Teboho. Ha ba fihl Katse e thetsa batho ba moo e re ke eona mochana oa Rangoane Teboho. Ts'epang e be o lula naheng pela masimo a Rangoane oa hae a ntse a bina ho fihlela bafiti ka tsela ba mo utloa ebe ba bolella Rangoane oa hae. angoane oa hae o khutla le Ts'epang e be ba etsetsa Katse leqheka ka ho mo chekela mokoti o nang le lebese. Katse e hloleha ke ho tlola mokoti e be e oela ka hare ebe Rangoane o e kupetsa ka mobu.
